Comment_glosser: It seems that this is a case of overcounting as they count towards the next hand or foot etc.

Value: ãʔá sáno óõ̀p maʔã́ pa-bábe pí
Comment_contributor: (litː 'get this without brother from our hand' )

Value: ãá sáno píra mát maʔã́ pa-bábe pí
Comment_contributor: (litː 'get this with brother from our hand' )
( litː 'get our eyes from our foot' )
( litː 'get one from the foot of another person' )
